attributes.action: Planning Applications which have a petition with over Ten Thousand names against it should go to a local referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Contentious planning applications can cause large amounts of public concern and unhappiness
An example of this is the Mega Mosque application in Dudley which has had over 75000 names petition against it
If a local referendum were triggered after a petition of 10000 names was recieved, these issues could be resolved democratically
